DOC.detailed_description: Despite availability wide range antidepressant drug , 30 % 40 % patient major depression fail respond first-line antidepressant ( e.g. , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor [ SSRIs ] ) treatment , despite adequate dosage , duration , compliance . Furthermore , medication may take week month achieve full effect , meantime , patient continue suffer symptom continue risk self-harm well harm personal professional life . Thus , clear need develop novel improve therapeutic treatment-resistant major depression effective rapid onset action . Preclinical clinical study suggest antidepressant combine mechanism action ( e.g. , combination selective serotonin-reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ) may effective either agent alone achieve remission ( Nelson et al 2004 ) . Thus , stand reason combination antidepressant mechanisms action combine may synergistic effect superior antidepressant single mechanism action . Preclinical clinical study suggest dopaminergic system may play major role pathophysiology depression . Preclinical study suggest synergistic antidepressant effect combination SSRI selective D3 receptor agonist animal model depression . Similarly , preliminary clinical study suggest synergism combination treatment affect serotonin dopamine system . Together , data suggest treatment affect serotonin dopamine system effective agent use single mechanism . We propose compare combination selective dopaminergic agonist SSRI patient treatment-resistant major depression . To knowledge , control double-blind study date examine efficacy serotonin dopamine combination give start treatment . Patients , age 18 year old , diagnosis major depression ( without psychotic feature ) , randomize combination selective dopaminergic receptor agonist SSRI either drug alone period 6 week . Acute efficacy determine demonstrate great remission rate use specify criterion . Approximately 115 patient acute major depression enrol study .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Male female subject , 18 65 year age . 2 . Female subject childbearing potential must use medically accept mean contraception . 3 . Each subject must level understanding sufficient agree require test examination sign inform consent document . 4 . Subjects must fulfill DSMIV criterion Major Depression ( 296.33 ) without psychotic feature , base clinical assessment confirm structured diagnostic interview , SCIDP . 5 . Subjects must initial score great equal 20 MADRS Visit 1 Visit 2 . 6 . Subjects must great 25 % decrease MADRS total score washout ( Visits 1 2 ) . 7 . Current past history lack response least one adequate antidepressant trial ( SSRI ) operationally define use Antidepressant Treatment History Form ( ATHF ) ( Sackeim 2001b ) . If criterion meet , fourweek prospective trial standard antidepressant ( patient ' clinician ' discretion ) may give .
